sentences.sentence: Each group will have the same set of questions, in order to ensure comparability.
sentences.translation: 为确保可比性，每一组将得到一套同样的问题。

sentences.sentence: After including the continuity and comparability of actual humanity, it is dispersed by two methods.
sentences.translation: 在介绍了实际人性的连续性和可比较性之后，对其进行了两种方法的离散。

sentences.sentence: These should help streamline and standardize reporting requirements while also improving the international comparability of data.
sentences.translation: 这些指标将有助于使报告的要求合理化和标准化，并同时提高数据在国际上的可比性。
